pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Papers of the University of Virginia Institute of Public Affairs 1925-1953.
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: This collection consists chiefly of correspondence, proceedings, manuscripts of speeches, registration cards, news letters manuscripts, and clippings. Correspondents include: Everett Ross Clinchy, Fred Essery, Frank Fuller, Henry (Harry) Augustus Garfield, Frank S. Hopkins, Edwin L. James, Charles Gilmore Maphis, William Emmet Moore, and John Sharp Williams.
pageContext._xxxcollectionExtentxtxt: There seems to be a box of reel to reel tape but it isn’t clear if these are for broadcasts or simply deal with the issue of broadcasting.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: There seems to be a box of reel to reel tape but it isn’t clear if these are for broadcasts or simply deal with the issue of broadcasting.
